Description: A unique identifier for each count record
The unique identifier for event records, can be used to join count records with event records
The scientific name of the phocid species
The common name of the phocid species
The sum of all of the other '_count' columns, i.e., the total count for the corresponding census/location/species
Aggregate count of adult females for the corresponding census/location/species
Aggregate count of adults of unknown sex
Aggregate count of juveniles of unknown sex
Aggregate count of pups (young of the year, less than one year old) of any sex
Aggregate count of unknown age class females
Aggregate count of unknown age class males
Aggregate count of phocids of unknown age class and unknown sex
